activities: DATATRAK International, Inc. collects and stores clinical research data on behalf of our clients in secure databases, including data related to study participants, clinical research investigators, medical and healthcare professionals, customers, vendors, contractors and consultants. DATATRAK conducts global business, in which, HR data may be collected, stored and processed from our global clients. DATATRAK may transfer personal data between members of the European Union and the United States.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Computer Software - (CSF)General Services - (GSV)Computer Services - (CSV)General Science & Technology - (GST)
personaldata: All electronic personal information that may be hosted on DATATRAK servers, including personal and/or human resources data.
recoursemech: DATATRAK agrees to cooperate with JAMS – an independent dispute resolution mechanism, under the EU-U.S. Privacy Shield Framework. To open an EU-U.S. Privacy Shield or Safe Harbor case contact JAMS here: https://www.jamsadr.com/eu-us-privacy-shield.
